tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE furniture_catalog (
  furniture_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  furniture_name VARCHAR(255),
  category VARCHAR(50),
  price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE furniture_catalog (
  furniture_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  category VARCHAR(50),
  price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  stock_quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE design_projects (
  project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  project_name VARCHAR(100),
  date_created DATE,
  CONSTRAINT fk_user_id FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_preferences(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_sessions (
  session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  start_time TIMESTAMP,
  end_time TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT fk_user_id_sessions FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_preferences(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE furniture_catalog (
  furniture_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  category VARCHAR(50),
  price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE room_design (
  design_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  furniture_id INT,
  quantity INT,
  layout_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
  order_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  furniture_id INT,
  order_date TIMESTAMP,
  quantity INT
);
